job_description: SummaryPayfirma is an award winning technology startup based in Vancouver. We develop technology that lets any business accept credit and debit cards intheir stores, online or on a mobile or tablet device.We are seeking a dynamic individual to join our QA Team. We are looking for energetic and personable people who are interested in expanding theirQA skill set while working on exciting industry leading projects. This is the right job for you if you are outgoing, attentive to detail, eager to learn newtechnologies and have what it takes to track down and capture those hard to find bugs.Primary ResponsibilitiesParticipate in Test Planning, Creation and Execution of Test Cases, Defect Reporting, Defect Verification and General Documentation.Investigation of issues in order to determine specific steps for reproduction and scope.Create test cases and test suites to ensure thorough regression testing.Analysis of complicated systems with many points of integration on a low level where you may be exposed to a variety of different technologies.Work with various mobile platforms such as iOS, Blackberry, Android to ensure that the mobile applications meet specifications.Work with different browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE to ensure web applications and integrations meet specifications.Collaborate with your team members during the investigation and reproduction of defects that impact our merchants and their customers.Report details of issues in JIRA.Documentation of information in Confluence.
